lead_paragraph: Maodo Lo had 16 points, 6 rebounds and 5 steals, and visiting Columbia (14-6, 3-0) stayed undefeated in Ivy League play with a 77-60 win over Dartmouth (7-10, 1-2).
snippet: Maodo Lo had 16 points, 6 rebounds and 5 steals, and visiting Columbia (14-6, 3-0) stayed undefeated in Ivy League play with a 77-60 win over Dartmouth (7-10, 1-2).
abstract: Columbia beats Dartmouth, 77-60; other college basketball scores noted.
